verses.name: Ephesians 6:15
verses.text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;

verses.name: Ephesians 6:16
verses.text: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

verses.name: Ephesians 6:17
verses.text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

verses.name: Ephesians 6:18
verses.text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

verses.name: Ephesians 6:19
verses.text: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,
